Date: 23/09/2015 01:39:19
Message:
CB-9565: Build failure for Windows 10.  This error is a result of using x64 Node and an incompatibility with x64 msbuild; the .NET Native compiler is x86 only (for where it can run).  As a result, when msbuild-x64 tries to use it, it fails.  This works around the issue by running x86 instead. #MsgLength=294
